product_description: A clean-lined design beautifully showcases the floral-patterned exterior of a lightweight tote featuring a well-organized triple compartment interior.
product_details_and_care:
A clean-lined design beautifully showcases the floral-patterned exterior of a lightweight tote featuring a well-organized triple compartment interior. A logo charm adds a signature finishing touch to the fan-favorite style.
Snap-tab closure
Shoulder straps
Interior zip divider pocket
Leather
Imported
